News.Title: Aarti Industries Targets ₹1,800-2,200 Crore EBITDA in 3 Years
News.Summary: Aarti Industries has set a target to achieve ₹1,800-2,200 crore EBITDA within three years through heavy investments and strategic expansion initiatives. The company plans to expand its fluorination capabilities, start operations at Zone-4 and MPP facilities, and move into advanced chemicals. The company forecasts achieving over 15% return on capital employed (ROCE) and expects margin growth as global markets stabilize.

News.Title: Aaron Industries Board Approves 1:1 Bonus Share Issue
News.Summary: Aaron Industries' board has approved a 1:1 bonus share issue for shareholders. This means existing shareholders will receive one additional share for every share they currently hold.
